exceptions.exn: In environment eps : R -> Prop H : Rbar_locally 1 eps The term "eps" has type "R -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "posreal".
The LHS of ln_div (ln (_ / _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rabs_mult (Rabs (_ * _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rabs_Rinv (Rabs (/ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros. unfold is_lim. intros eps. exists eps. intros. unfold Rdiv. rewrite ln_div. rewrite Rabs_mult. rewrite Rabs_Rinv. rewrite Rabs_ln. apply (Rlt_le_trans _ 1). apply ln_lt_2. auto. apply ln_continue. auto. apply ln_1. apply Rlt_0_2. auto. apply H0. unfold Rabs. apply Rlt_0_1.
